official_title: A bill to authorize the United States Army Corps of Engineers to carry out a navigation project in Camden, New Jersey.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to carry out a navigation project in the vicinity of Camden, New Jersey.
